subject: Re: [junit] Question
msgSnippet: Vivek, I don t think anyone s answered yet, and I m stumped.  Did you get an answer on the httpunit mailing list?  Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
Vivek,

I don't think anyone's answered yet, and I'm stumped. Did you get an
answer on the httpunit mailing list? Good luck,

David Saff

vivek wrote:

> Hi,
>
> This isn't related to junit, but I thought I may get an answer
> here.This is
> related to HTTP UNIT.
>
> My web application has two pages, input and output page. Input page has a
> phone number formfield and and a hidden form field temp_phone number.
> Page
> is supposed to copy the value in visible field to hidden field and
>
> GO. But When I do
>
> Form.setParameter("number","1234567");
>
> For.submit() I get the error,
>
> "Tha parameter is extected a value '' but asked to take a value 1234567."
>
>
>
> Can it be dealt at httpunit level,or some other thing is required ?
>
>
>
> Thanks,
>
> Vivek
>
>
>
> Exact error is pasted here.
>
>
>
> http://10.18.6.101:8020/pps/ListSubscriberIn.jsp
>
> 9
>
> labels tot:1
>
> fieldname: MSISDN,value: 9600092
>
> E
>
> Time: 36.902
>
> There was 1 error:
>
> 1)
> testSmoke(ShowListTest)com.meterware.httpunit.MissingParameterValueException
> :
>
> Parameter 'MSISDN' must have the value ''. Attempted to set it to: {
> 9600092 }
>
> at
> com.meterware.httpunit.FormControl.claimValueIsRequired(FormControl.j
>
> ava:302)
>
> at
> com.meterware.httpunit.TextFormControl.claimValueIsRequired(FormContr
>
> ol.java:775)
>
> at
> com.meterware.httpunit.HiddenFieldFormControl.claimRequiredValues(For
>
> mControl.java:838)
>
> at
> com.meterware.httpunit.FormParameter.setValues(FormParameter.java:89)
>
> at com.meterware.httpunit.WebForm.setParameter(WebForm.java:612)
>
> at com.meterware.htt
>
>
>

>
